{{Wired embedded system |brand=Cisco |model=RV042 |revision=G V01 |asin=B008CWW6VY |price=370 |est_release_date=July 2012 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |type=VPN Router, router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Cavium |cpu1_model=CN5010 |cpu1_cspeed=300 |fla1=32 |fla1_brand=Intel |fla1_model=JS28F256-M29EWH |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4T51163QJ-BCE7 |ram1_num=2 |jtag=yes |serial=yes |eth_cpu=yes |eth_chip2_brand=Broadcom |eth_chip2_model=BCM54612E |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM53125M |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=2 |addl_chips=FPGA;Lattice;LCMXO256-3TN100C;;1;,,, 2A, 18V Synchronous Rectified Step-Down Converter;MPS;MP1482DS;;4; |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui_eth=B0:FA:EB }} '''Cisco RV042G Dual Gigabit WAN VPN Router'''
[http://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/products/routers/rv042g-dual-gigabit-wan-vpn-router/index.html Product page]
"3000-RV042G41G10" and "Manufactured for CISCO" are silk-screened on the board.
=== Reviews === *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/lanwan/lanwan-reviews/31826-cisco-rv042g-dual-gigabit-wan-vpn-router-reviewed ''Cisco RV042G Dual Gigabit WAN VPN Router Reviewed'' on '''SmallNetBuilder''']
